explanation: Greg claims he went straight from Conference Room B to the lobby to meet a vendor. But Clue 1 reveals no vendors visited the office today -- all vendor meetings were cancelled. Greg lied about meeting a vendor to cover the gap in his timeline when he was actually in the break room eating the lasagna. Clue 2 confirms Greg accessed the break room floor during the theft window.
funFact: Office lunch theft is so common that a survey found 18% of workers admit to intentionally eating a coworker's food!
